definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: Clips from the movie will be presented on video.
sentences.chinese: 這部影片的剪輯將在電視上播映。

sentences.english: There is a TV show about AIDS on right now. ; (
sentences.chinese: 電視正播映一個有關愛滋病的節目。

sentences.english: This programme is for our young viewers.
sentences.chinese: 本節目是爲少年兒童播映的。

sentences.english: They have cut the obscene passages from the film to show it on television.
sentences.chinese: 他們已把影片中的淫穢鏡頭剪去以便在電視上播映。

sentences.english: Since early October, it has been telecasting by their regular broadcasting station.
sentences.chinese: 自從十月初的時候，此劇集己經在電視臺播映了。

sentences.english: Scheduling for the miniseries has not been officially announced.
sentences.chinese: 至於這一迷你係列的播映計劃，官方尚未正式公佈。
漢娜蒙塔納不再播映了？

sentences.english: Did you turn off that violent old movie you're watchin.
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾經關掉播映著那些暴力老電影的頻道。

sentences.english: What is the on-the-air hour of this channel?
sentences.chinese: 這頻道的播映時間是什麼時候？

sentences.english: A 24-hour channel presents the latest news and weather report from Japan and World.
sentences.chinese: 二十四小時播映最新日本及世界各地新聞及天氣報告。

sentences.english: Broadcast domestic animation market, after years of weakness, not to mention its derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 國內的動畫播映市場，積弱經年，更遑論其衍生產品。

definition: to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
to exhibit as broadcast/to show (on TV)
to cut (from a movie etc)/to censor
abbr. for 臺灣電視公司|台湾电视公司, Taiwan Television (TTV)
to perform (e.g. on the stage)/to lecture
